user_query: Please generate a daily horoscope for my zodiac sign, Scorpio. Additionally, I would like to explore the traits and characteristics of the zodiac sign Aquarius. Can you provide me with a random tarot card reading for the day? Finally, tell me a daily phrase to inspire me.

TaskList.description: Fetch the daily horoscope for Scorpio.
Gather information on the traits and characteristics of the zodiac sign Aquarius.
Perform a random tarot card reading for the day.
